channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 12:53 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Follow the following messages.
item.description: 游릭 12:53 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Follow the following messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 12:53 Driven Alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Salt for further reports.

item.title: 游리 12:40 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovsk territorial community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 12:40 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovsk territorial community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 12:40 Alarm to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 12:40 Alarm to the Kharkiv region.
